message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll love it! Would you like to make an offer on it?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I was hoping to keep the price closer to my budget. Could we possibly negotiate the price down to $130?
Hi Bob, I understand you're looking to stay within your budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about we meet at $140?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $135 for the product. I hope this meets somewhere in between our expectations.

Hi Bob, I appreciate your persistence. I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we might not meet in the middle. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm not losing too much. How about we meet at $142?
Hello Alice, I've considered your last offer and am willing to compromise further. I'd like to propose a price of $138 for the product. I hope this helps us reach an agreement.

Hi Bob, I appreciate your continued willingness to negotiate. I'm getting a bit concerned that we're getting close to the minimum price I'm willing to accept, but I'm still hopeful we can come to an agreement. How about we meet at $145?
Hello Alice, I've looked into the product further and believe we can come to an agreement closer to my budget. I would like to propose a price of $140 for the product. I hope this is acceptable.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your persistence, but I'm starting to get a bit firm on the price. I'm willing to meet you at $143, but I'm not going any lower than that. This is my final offer.
Hello Alice, I've given this some thought and would like to propose a final offer of $141 for the product. I hope this brings us closer to an agreement.
